sentences.english: Sukh Sagar Indian Restaurant serves exotic Vegetarian Cuisine from India.
sentences.chinese: Sukh萨加尔印度餐厅印度提供异国情调的素食。

sentences.english: Scrumptious Cakes make an exotic Thanksgiving Gift for dear ones.
sentences.chinese: 美味的蛋糕是一份充满异国情调的礼物。

sentences.english: " Mao and the natural and exotic " girl " in this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 毛岛的自然和异国情调的女孩在这个画廊。

sentences.english: “I was thinking more in terms of a fancy French restaurant, ” I replied.
sentences.chinese: “我更多想到的是异国情调的法国饭店，”我回答说。

sentences.english: No, I have never vacationed anywhere exotic .
sentences.chinese: 没有，我从未去有异国情调的地方度过假。

sentences.english: The film retains much of the book's exotic flavour.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影保存了原着的许多异国情调。

sentences.english: Aluminum frames are lighter and are often made of oversize or exotically shaped tubing.

sentences.english: On Necker, the pace is tropical, the ambience exotic.

sentences.english: You will see many exotic birds and of course the world famous alligators.
sentences.chinese: 你能见到很多有异国情调的鸟和世界闻名的鄂鱼。

sentences.english: Experience the plush comfort and enjoy exotic splendor of these thatched cottages .
sentences.chinese: 体验豪华舒适和享受异国情调的辉煌，这些茅草屋。

sentences.english: It is exotically named "graffiti" and "purple cape.
sentences.chinese: 它被富有异国情调的命名为“涂鸦”和“紫色角。

sentences.english: But they are consistently exotic, always other.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们有着另类的异国情调。

sentences.english: Offer fragrant and delicious coffee and western style buffet foods, add exotic atmosphere to your life.
sentences.chinese: 香浓咖啡和西式自助美食，更添异国情调。

sentences.english: It is the rich, exotic essence of Ayurveda; the science of life.
sentences.chinese: 它是丰富的，充满异国情调的本质阿育吠陀生命科学。

sentences.english: Strong tastes exoticism is the main focus of the design project.
